intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Blood Angels Space Marine chapter or any of its successor chapters. The Blood Angels are well-known across the galaxy for their bloodthirsty nature in battle, and feared for the curse of the flawed gene-seed they carry.
strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Blood Angels detachments and Aircraft formations.

sections.name: Blood Angels Core Detachments
sections.description: One Death Company formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Death Company
formations.units: One Chaplain, four Death Company Marines plus transport (Drop Pods or on foot only)
extraUnits: Add two Death Company Marines: 75 points
Add up to two Death Company Dreadnoughts: 75 points each

formations.name: Assault Terminators
extraUnits: Replace one Assault Terminator with three Stormravens or three Land Raiders: 100 points, or add two Land Raider Redeemers: 100 points

sections.name: Blood Angels Support Detachments
sections.description: Up to two Support Detachments may be taken per Core Detachment.

formations.name: Baal Predators
formations.units: Any four of the following units: Baal Predator Hades, Baal Predator Infernus

formations.name: Land Speeder
formations.units: Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado

sections.name: Blood Angels Navy & Titan Legion Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

formations.name: 0-1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace the Vanguard Class Light Cruiser with a Strike Cruiser: 50 points, or a Battle Barge: 125 points

formations.name: Warhounds
extraUnits: Add an additional Warhound Titan: 200 points

upgrades.title: Blood Angels Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment.

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Assaults
items.description: Add two Assaults to the formation

items.name: Attack Bikes
items.description: Replace any number of Assault Bikes with an equal number of Attack Bikes or Melta Bikes

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Dreadnoughts or Furioso Dreadnoughts to the formation

items.name: Honor Guards
items.description: In a formation containing a Supreme Commander character: replace up to two Assaults or Tacticals with Sanguinary Guards

items.name: Land Raider Transport
items.description: Add any number of Land Raiders and/or Land Raider Redeemers, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Predators
items.description: Add two Baal Predator Hades or two Baal Predator Infernus

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Blood Angels Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: Give all Scouts in the formation 'Sniper' on their Schwerer Bolter

items.name: Stormraven Transports
items.description: Add any number of Stormravens, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Typhoons
items.description: Replace up to five Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons
